alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 12 at 12:44PM CST until December 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water inundates low lying areas and agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Sunday the stage was 9.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 600 AM CST.
